keywords.DESCRIPTION: Also treated as played when discarded. Return to your draw pile next turn.
A choice that is always a 1-cost #yAttack card.
A choice that is always a 2-cost #yAttack card.
Receive damage for every card played, stack halfed.
Proper to the turn you receive it, cost reduced by #1 because it's proper.
Deal #b15% less damage, further reduced by its stack, stack reduced by 1 at the end of its turn.
Receive #b15% more damage, further increased by 1/3 of its stack. Receive damage equals to its stack and lose all stack at the end of your turn.
Receive damage of its stack at the start of your turn.
You need ammo to play certain cards.
